lead_paragraph: Manchester United maintained their push for a top-four Premier League finish when they beat Everton 1-0 with a second-half goal by French striker Anthony Martial at Old Trafford on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: United Boost Top-Four Hopes With 1-0 Win Over Everton
headline.main: United Boost Top-Four Hopes With 1-0 Win Over Everton

snippet: Manchester United maintained their push for a top-four Premier League finish when they beat Everton 1-0 with a second-half goal by French striker Anthony Martial at Old Trafford on Sunday....
